# k8s_k8s_nginx_org_virtual_server_v1_manifest (Data Source)

VirtualServer defines the VirtualServer resource.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "k8s_k8s_nginx_org_virtual_server_v1_manifest" "example" {
  metadata = {
    name      = "some-name"
    namespace = "some-namespace"
  }
}
```
